title: Stonehenge
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 624 words, Level N (Grade 2), Lexile 830L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     W and Z1
description: Why did a group of people come together to make a massive ring of stones over five thousand years ago? In this book, students will learn why ancient people might have built this magnificent monument, as well as how they could have done it in an age before modern machinery.
